iati-activity.title: Renforcement des mécanismes de protection des enfants dans le contexte marqué par le mouvement des populations a Bangui et Bossangoa.
iati-activity.description: (1) To ensure that at least 20% of children from IDP have access to and attend the 10 CFS by through psychosocial educative and recreative activities. (2) 500 children affected by the crisis benefit from a proper referring. (3) 3000 children/adolescents participate in group discussions and awareness-raising sessions around child protection, GBV, HIV and Aids (4) 12,500 members of CBOs will be trained to cope with threats posed by current context in interventions zones. (5) To reinforce War Child staff\\\'s capacity in providing psychosocial support to community volunteers and networks. (6) A regular monitoring of the activities and a final evaluation has been planned.
Fourteen Child Friendly Spaces (CFS) were set up in Bangui and Bossangoa. Protection, education and livelihoods activities were run as alternative to schools (whilst these remained closed in 2014).
